lt.eif.viko.acizikovas.trecias.Application

Class DiscService

  • java.lang.Object
    • lt.eif.viko.acizikovas.trecias.Application.DiscService

  • @Path(value="discs")
public class DiscService
extends java.lang.Object

    DiscService class

    This is the main web application service class. It is used to describe the methods used to access the web api.

      • getAllDisc

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public java.util.List<Disc> getAllDisc()
        Methods used to get all the items in the repository as XML.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all the Discs in the repository.

      • findOneDisc

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{id}")
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public Disc findOneDisc(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                          int id)
        Method to obtain one certain instance of Disc object from the repository as XML.
        Parameters:
        id - A value which is used to find a specific Disc object by it's ID.
        Returns:
        Returns one Disc object from the repository.

      • updateDisc

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{id}")
 @Consumes(value="application/xml")
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public void updateDisc(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                              int id,
                                                                                                                              Disc disc)
        Method to update specific Disc object in the repository as XML.
        Parameters:
        id - A value which indicates the ID of the Disc object to update.
        disc - Disc object with updated values.

      • deleteDisc

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{id}")
 @Produces(value="application/xml")
public void deleteDisc(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                            int id)
        Method that deletes specific Disc object from the repository as XML.
        Parameters:
        id - Value used to find the specific Disc object for deletion.
